form_terms_prefix: I am a human and I accept the
legal_terms_intro: Please review these terms carefully. Using Spexity means you agree to the responsibilities and guidelines outlined here.
legal_terms_section_eligibility_content: Spexity is available only to human users. Automated agents, bots, scripts, and any non-human actors may not create accounts or add content to Spexity.
legal_terms_section_content_content: You must not post illegal content, promote unlawful activity, or facilitate actions that violate applicable laws or regulations when using Spexity. All content you submit must be your own work or you must have explicit authorization from the rightful owner to post it on Spexity.
legal_terms_section_changes_content: To serve the community better, we may update these terms occasionally. Continued use of Spexity indicates your acceptance of the latest version of these terms, and the most recent revision date is listed above.
